amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief and protections to military personnel, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3847 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S15378) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief and protections to military personnel, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3847 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
